response.original_title: Super Bowl Champions Collector's Series: Pittsburgh Steelers
response.overview: The 1970's meant a new era in the NFL - an era of domination by the Pittsburgh Steelers, Led by coaching powerhouse Chuck Noll and quarterback great Terry Bradshaw, and backed by Steel Curtain defensive legends "Mean" Joe Greene, Jack  Ham,  and Jack Lambert, the Steelers were the first to win four NFL titles and the only team to win back-to-back Superbowls twice.
response.title: Super Bowl Champions Collector's Series: Pittsburgh Steelers
